markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Spring Attack](/Feats.aspx?ID=413) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
<trait label="Press" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=133" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 152 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Requirements**
You are adjacent to an enemy.

</column>

---

Springing away from one foe, you Strike at another. Stride up to your Speed, but you must end that movement within melee reach of a different enemy. At the end of your movement, make a melee Strike against an enemy now within reach. You can use Spring Attack while Burrowing, Climbing, Flying, or Swimming instead of Striding if you have the corresponding movement type.
name: Spring Attack
requirement: You are adjacent to an enemy.
requirement_markdown: You are adjacent to an enemy.
